Make a patent description for Motorized pet door apparatus from the following summary: An electrically powered pet door assembly for use in a home or building. An apparatus as set forth in claim 6 wherein said trigger means includes a Schmitt trigger. A treadle electrically connected to a rotational and translational drive unit for raising and lowering said panel member.

Make a patent description for Power line to drive a vehicle from the following summary: A motor vehicle power line comprises a combustion engine (8), a gearbox (10) and an electronically controlled clutch (20) The engine throttle (84) is actuated by an electric motor (92) controlled by the electronic control (48) usually in response to throttle demand signals. A manual move of the gear shift level (16) causes the clutch ( 20) automatically to disengage.

Make a patent description for Refrigerant reclaim method and apparatus from the following summary: Refrigerant reclaim system includes a compressor, a heat exchanger, an oil separator, a condenser, a chill tank, a filter-dryer and a cooling coil in the chill tank. Refrigerant to be reclaimed is drawn through the cold side of the heat exchangers, converted to a gas and discharged into the oil separators. The flow of the stream is abruptly interrupted to separate oil from refrigerant.

Make a patent description for First stage tire building machine including selectively coupled bead setters and bladder cages from the following summary: An improved machine for fabricating tire carcasses. Machine comprises in combination a rotatable main drum upon which ply material is laid up. Magnetic bead setters reciprocable from retracted positions axially exterior of the main and auxiliary drums. Bladders positionable between radially interior and exterior positions with regard to main drum.

Make a patent description for Apparatus for separating commingling heavier and lighter immiscible from the following summary: An apparatus for separating commingled heavier and lighter immiscible liquids and solids is claimed. The apparatus includes a vertical flow tube, a horizontal spreader baffle and a fluid inlet pipe. The baffle provides means for changing fluid direction from horizontal to vertical.

Make a patent description for Flowable demineralized bone powder composition and its use in bone repair from the following summary: The composition of claim 1 is derived from cortical bone, cancellous and/or corticocancellous allogenic bone tissue. Claim 3 contains at least one additional ingredient selected from the group. The average particle size of the demineralized bone powder is from about 0.1 to about 1.2 cm.

Make a patent description for Tape cartridge storage system from the following summary: Tape cartridge storage system is claimed to be the world's first tape storage system. System has horizontal shelves for holding tape cartridge storage holders, and a plurality of movable storage racks are mounted for rolling movement in front of the fixed storage rack.

Make a patent description for Method and circuitry for automatic control of the frequency for a radio telephone from the following summary: The frequency of the signal detected at the receiver is mixed with the output frequency of a phase-locked loop in a first mixer. The output frequency is mixed in a second mixer with the frequency derived from a local oscillator. A circuit according to claim 3 comprises a counter means which counts the pulses generated by the second mixer means. The control signal producer means further comprises a second counter means connected to the local oscillators.

Make a patent description for Cordless iron having water and electrical supplies responsive to an iron rest from the following summary: Cordless iron has water and electrical supplies responsive to an iron rest. It includes a soleplate and a steam chamber both heated through electrical connection. The steam ejection is stopped when the iron body is mounted on the rest. A cordless iron according to claim 7, wherein the electrical connection is effected by a receiving means provided on the iron.

Make a patent description for Wire pistol from the following summary: The invention relates to a wire pistol comprising a wire feed mechanism and a counterpulley for biasing the wire into engagement with the feed pulley. The DC motor is adapted to have successive operating voltage pulses of variable pulse width and/or variable pulse frequency applied. The position of said gas head (7) is adaptable to the varying position of the longitudinal axis of the wires.

Make a patent description for Compound marked with tritium, its preparation and its use in the location of nuclear receptors of retinoids from the following summary: 6-[3-(1-adamantyl)-4-methoxyphenyl]-2-naphthoic acid marked with tritium. It is used in titration of nuclear receptors of retinoids in the presence of contaminating CRABP.

Make a patent description for Finger profile identification system from the following summary: Method of and apparatus for verifying the identity of an individual is based on the profile of a hand print. A set of reference data is created by determining the location of the edges of each finger separately. The apparatus does not require posts or grooves to force the hand or fingers into any predeterminded position.

Make a patent description for Air bag system for automobile from the following summary: An air bag system for an automobile comprises a collision detector for detecting a collision of the automobile, an inflater for generating gas under pressure, and an air bag device mounted on a front body member located in front of a seat. A seating condition sensor detects a seating condition of a passenger seated on the seat, taking into consideration seat position, reclining angle, passenger size and posture.

Make a patent description for Aglaonema plant named Rembrandt from the following summary: A new and distinct cultivar of Aglaonema plant named `Rembrandt` characterized by its unique leaf coloring comprised of dark green and gray-green stripes, and yellow spots and midribs.

Make a patent description for Releasable connector for interconnecting two parts subjected to high stresses from the following summary: A releasable connector for interconnecting a first part and a second part. At least one of the parts being subjected to high stresses in particular of vibratory origin and of thermal origin. The connection made in this way being such that said composite combustion chamber is subjected neither to welding nor drilling.

Make a patent description for Car door safety device from the following summary: The device is designed to monitor the space normally occupied by an automobile door. When impingement of the electromagnetic radiation on the detectors is disrupted, the electrical circuit activates a mechanical device, for example a solenoid, which places a small rubber rod in the path of the closing door.

Make a patent description for Tide clock assembly with optical device providing the appearance of rising and falling fluid from the following summary: Tide clock assembly with optical device providing the appearance of rising and falling fluid. Display using a clear rod and colored elements in a manner to give the impression of fluid in a rod and the height of the fluid representing the present tide level. Tide level can be displayed in hours to high or low tide.

Make a patent description for Metal radionuclide chelating compounds for improved chelation kinetics from the following summary: The present invention provides metal chelating compounds, to chelates and chelate-targeting agent conjugates. Metals, and metal oxides, capable of being chelated by the compounds include those that are radionuclides, like 99m Tc and 186/188 Re.

Make a patent description for Recombinant clones of Chlamydia trachomatis lipopolysaccharide from the following summary: The clone is a hybrid lipopolysaccharide molecule composed of both chlamydia and E. coli components. The cloning process involves digesting whole genomic KNA from Chlamydia with a restriction enzyme. A recombinant clone depositied in the American Type Culture Collection under the accession number 53041 designated #JM109 (pFEN207)

Make a patent description for Apparatus and method for making electrical connections in an implantable pacemaker from the following summary: A multi-part molded pacemaker connector that meets the precise requirements imposed by the VS-1 standard, yet does not require complex or expensive machining of individual parts. The connector includes three molded pieces: a body tip, a body ring, and an entrance connector.

Make a patent description for Concealed door positioning mechanism from the following summary: Concealed door positioning mechanism comprises a housing concealed in a door jamb and a mechanism mounted in the housing for holding the door open in one or more selected positions. Linkage connects the piston to linkage mounted onto the door in such a way that when the door opens, the linkage forces the piston upward in the cylinder. Claim 5 includes a linkage which causes said linkage to force said piston and said shaft up said cylinder.

Make a patent description for Coating compositions containing ethylenically unsaturated carbamates from the following summary: Coating compositions containing ethylenically unsaturated carbamates are formulated with allylic monomers and unsaturated co-reactants. Coating compositions are selected from (meth)-acryloyl monomers, maleates and fumarates to provide air-dry-and heat-curable coating compositions.

Make a patent description for Liquid developer for electrostatic photography from the following summary: The liquid developer comprises resin grains dispersed in a non-aqueous solvent having an electric resistance of at least 10 9  Œ©cm and a dielectric constant of not higher than 3.5. The dispersed resin grains are copolymer resin grains obtained by polymerizing a solution containing at least one kind of a monofunctional monomer.

Make a patent description for Middle distillate hydrocracking process from the following summary: Middle distillate hydrocracking process for use in producing middle distillated products. Catalysts include a layered magnesium silicate such as sepiolite, an intercalated clay such as pillared clay and a crystalline molecular sieve.

Make a patent description for Deodorizing and cleaning compositions and method from the following summary: Aqueous deodorizing and cleaning compositions having a pH of from about 4 to 11 containing defined quantities of an alkali metal halogenite together with a salt of a transition or post-transition metal. The alcohol is isopropanol or secondary butyl alcohol. A method of deodorising malodorous substrates which comprise contacting the substrate with an amount of a composition of claim 1, 2, 3, 5 or 8.

Make a patent description for Method of and apparatus for optimal scheduling of television programming to maximize customer satisfaction from the following summary: The program contents of each TV station at any hour specified by the subscriber can be displayed in one picture. The subscriber can also specify a priority order to programs recorded during his absence in order to play back the recorded programs within a given time. The computer center automatically operating linear programming and sending from the computer center to the subscriber a new and more reliable individual television program list revised according to said complaints.

Make a patent description for Drum hoop from the following summary: A drum hoop for a musical drum includes a reinforcing channel member and a reinforcing rim. The reinforced construction permits the drum head to be provided with a very high tension without bending or breaking the hoop. A counter hoop with a number of twelve aperture is claimed in Claim 9.

Make a patent description for African violet plant named Dominica from the following summary: African violet plant named Dominica is a new and distinct cultivar of African violet. It is characterized by its star-shaped, purplish blue flowers with white, wavy edges. The plant has a vigorous growth habit, flowering 10-11 weeks after potting.

Make a patent description for Nectarine tree "Zee Grand" from the following summary: The May Grand Nectarine (U.S. Plant Pat. No. 2,794) matures 2 to 3 days earlier and produces a greater number of larger size fruit. The tree is further characterized by bearing fruit that are relatively uniform in size throughout the tree.

Make a patent description for Anthurium plant named Pink Aristocrat from the following summary: Anthurium plant named Pink Aristocrat has flowers which change from pink to cream and then to green as they age. symmetrical habit with free branching, long lasting flowers which are held well above the leaf canopy. axillary shoots that bloom from the first expanded leaf, and durable dark green leaves with good texture and a shiny surface.

Make a patent description for Combination seat belt retractor mechanism from the following summary: A combination seat belt retractor particularly useful for motor vehicles is described. The retractor is converted to the automatic locking mode by first fully withdrawing the seat belt webbing therefrom. Such action causes a switching lever to force a leaf spring in a position against the retractor.

Make a patent description for Multi-purpose farm implement from the following summary: Multi-purpose farm implement is transformable between three different configurations. In a first configuration, the invention is suitable for hauling goods. By rotating its side members about their inner edges, it may be transformed into a third configuration, suitable for presenting goods to livestock.

Make a patent description for Epoxy resin compositions from the following summary: Epoxy resin compositions are well suited for use as a sealant for electronic components. The composition includes an epoxy resin, a compound having at least two phenolic hydroxyl groups, an aromatic nitrogen-containing silane coupling agent and an inorganic filler.

Make a patent description for Daylily cultivar named Aztec Yellow from the following summary: A new variety of daylily distinguished by its clear, unspotted, lemon-yellow color. The cultivar has the further advantages of a very hardy growth habit when grown in the northern U.S. climate zones. It withstands very well the cold winter seasons.

Make a patent description for Method and system for voice coding based on vector quantization from the following summary: A system for voice coding based on vector quantization has an apparatus in which a distribution area of parameters representative of a voice is divided into a plurality of domains so that one vector (code vector) may correspond to one domain. An apparatus for representing individual code vectors by codes specific thereto.

Make a patent description for Orange tree `Beck Early Navel` from the following summary: The new orange tree is characterized by a somewhat smaller tree size as compared to other navel varieties, early maturity and a distinct red-orange color. The rind of the fruit is very durable.

Make a patent description for Production of radiation cured elastomer coated passive restraint device from the following summary: A method of manufacturing an inflatable confinement for use in passive air bag restraint devices. The confinement is formed by conforming a fabric to a mold having the shape of the desired confinement, and subsequently applying a layer of elastomer to the fabric. A curing operation then cures theElastomer such that the elastomers-coated fabric retains the shape.

Make a patent description for Annular ultrasonic transducers employing curved surfaces useful in catheter localization from the following summary: The technology was developed by the University of California, San Diego. The wavelength is the same as that used to scan a person's body. The method includes the steps of transducing pressure from said ultrasonic waves into an electrical signal with said piezoelectric material coating.

Make a patent description for Nectarine tree (Rose Diamond) from the following summary: Nectarine tree (Rose Diamond) developed as a hybridized seedling from the selected seed parent, Early Diamond (U.S. Plant Pat. No. 5,438) The fruit matures under the ecological conditions described in early June, with first picking on June 2, 1989, and is uniformly large in size.

Make a patent description for Dot matrix plasma display and method for driving same from the following summary: The dot matrix plasma display comprises a plurality of parallel cathode strips mounted on the upper surface of a dielectric substrate. Ionizable gas is contained within the envelope and is adapted to glow adjacent the junctures of any simultaneously actuated anode and cathode strip. The cathodes are scanned at a frequency which to the human eye gives the appearance that they are constantly actuated.

Make a patent description for Four-wheel steering system for vehicle from the following summary: Four-wheel steering system for vehicle claims to be the world's first. The rear wheel steering mechanism is capable of pivoting the rear wheels in a same phase direction relative to the front wheels when the steering wheel is rotated. The system according to claim 5 includes a follower support for rotatably supporting the follower rollers.

Make a patent description for Telescoping uncoupling lever from the following summary: A three-part telescoping uncoupling lever assembly is disclosed for railroad cars which are equipped with standard draft gear cushioning. The assembly includes a plastic sleeve formed from ultrahigh molecular weight polyethylene (U.H.M.W.) Each .[comprising]. .Iaddend.a rectilinear bar shaft integral with a U-shaped retainer.

Make a patent description for Folding ice-cream carton, carton blank and method from the following summary: A carton or package for packaging semi-fluid material which can be hardened by freezing, such as ice cream, sherbet, and the like, is formed from specially constructed integral carton blank and a special process for assembling the same. The method according to claim 5 comprises the steps of folding in the front and rear inner end wall-forming flaps at one end, and folding down a side cover flap thereover.

Make a patent description for Blocking device for fan ramjet engines from the following summary: When in an inoperative position, the first and second rings are moved above one another into an intermediate housing. The first ring is moved out farthest and has an end surface mating with the local oblique contour of the front wall. A device which blocks an annular nozzle outlet opening of the basic turbo engine with respect to the ram air flow.

Make a patent description for Method of inducing the decarboxylation of malic acid in must or fruit juice from the following summary: Method of inducing the decarboxylation of malic acid in must or fruit juice. Bacteria may be added before or at the commencement of alcoholic fermentation. One malolatic strain suitable in the method is Lactobacillus plantarum DSM 4361.

Make a patent description for Brake booster housing with a hub structure containing a valve mechanism arranged inside the housing from the following summary: The pneumatic brake booster comprises a housing formed from a front and a rear half-shell 12 and 10. The hub structure 24 and the valve mechanism 26 are arranged inside the housing. At least one elastic means 60 stressing the input member 56 axially away from the shutter seats.

Make a patent description for Method of introducing spectinomycin resistance into plants from the following summary: Method of introducing spectinomycin resistance into plants is described. Prokaryotic enzyme, aminoglycoside 3"-adenyltransferase (AGAT), in particular as encoded by a bacterial aadA gene, is useful as a selectable marker for transformed plants. Such markers are particularly advantageous because they are non-lethal.

Make a patent description for Methane conversion from the following summary: A method for the oxidative conversion of methane, at a high conversion and high selectivity to ethylene and ethane. Methane and oxygen are contacted with a contact material comprising lithium, in an effective amount, preferably 0.1 to 50 wt. %. The ratio of lithium to magnesium of the contact material, the ratio of methane to oxygen and the temperature are selected.

Make a patent description for Filtration membranes made from polyethersulfone/phenoxy resin blend from the following summary: Porous blended polymer (polyethersulfone, phenoxy resin) filtration membranes are provided. The invention also concerns a process for filtering matter from a fluid employing the membranes. The process of claim 12 wherein the solvent is N-methylpyrrolidone. A process to create an ultrafiltration membrane.

Make a patent description for Strawberry plant named Darline from the following summary: Strawberry plant named Darline is characterized by its vigorous growth habit, large fruit with firm surface, orange-red fruit color, medium season variety, erect leaves, and its long picking period.
